overview: In this collection of virtually unrelated scenes, Nina DePonca and Sascha are ladies in the future spouting some nonsense about the past which they know about only through video tapes. And the lucky viewers get to see each scene that our «guides» are talking about. Since the scenes have nothing in common or do not refer to the theme of the video, the whole thing gives the impression of being cut and pasted from odds and ends. The only sexual segment generating heat or interest is the trio of Randy West, Angela Baron and Victoria Paris and then only due to the energy of Paris.
title: 20th Century Fox
